thread.title: Upset Customer
thread.title_full: RC Willey reviewed by Upset Customer

author: Upset Customer
title: Upset Customer
text: Don't tell customers you are short staffed! Sales men leaving us while we were in the middle of purchasing multiple items, items delivered far out, phone customer service transferred multiple of times and on hold for over 24 minutes. Needed to furnish a brand new house and will now go to a different store!!
